website_summaries.verdict: The Under Armour HOVR Phantom RN is a neutral running shoe that is engineered to tackle different paved surfaces. With the technologies and features integrated into it, excellent fit, comfort, and responsiveness are experienced by the user. This road running shoe is crafted with materials that provide support, making an enjoyable and efficient ride possible. Besides running, this footwear is suitable for gym workout and outdoor training as well.
pros: Some of the users commented that the Under Armour HOVR Phantom RN provides a perfect fit
Most of the reviewers said that the shoe is comfortable
According to those who have tried it, the running shoe is best used for road running, outdoor training, and gym workout
It is responsive, based on a review
The running footwear is lightweight in structure, according to those who have bought it
The Under Armour HOVR Phantom RN is supportive, noted by a purchaser
It provides excellent grip on muddy, rocky and grassy surfaces, observed by some testers
cons: One of the consumers said that the fabric mesh used in making the shoe wears out easily
The shoe does not perform well when running on the treadmill
Based on a  review, the insole of the shoe starts to tear quickly after several uses only

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe Sized small
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear a size 10.5 with kswiss, puma and others. However when i got my size 10.5 i tried wearing them but the toe area was extremely tight and i ended up shipping them back. I would suggest trying to find a local shoe store that carries this shoe maybe in a color you do not want and trying them on to see for certain what size fits best. Then order the color you like.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Scott

customer_reviews.title: UA nailed it with this shoe! Super comfortable! Fits like glove.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted these from first sight. Only the Phantom, only the Green. I tried others at local retailers but didn't like. I saved these and bought as soon as back in stock. Was worth the wait. They are super comfortable and fit like a glove. Easy off and on as well. UA nailed it I'm.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Not a distance shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I love UA’s gear but this shoe is like a Nike shoe for me. It lacks space for the ball of the foot to expand while running which doesn’t make for a very good running shoe. The cushion on the heel is good but not quite what I would want as a distance runner; I prefer the heel more firm to go such long distances. The insole is NOT removable as it is integrated into the sole so don’t expect to put your favorite insole or arch support into this shoe. The aesthetics are flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Taurean26.2

customer_reviews.title: Competitor For Adidas Boost
customer_reviews.text: Let me start this review by saying I have sworn by Adidas Boost technology for the last several years. I have gone through probably half a dozen different Boost shoes since then. The UA HOVR Phantoms are incredible. I originally tried them on at Dicks and found out that they run a little small. I normally wear a size 10.5 but noticed I needed an 11 in these. Overall, the quality is comparable to Boost technology and in some cases I almost feel like it is better. 10/10 recommend this shoe to anyone looking for comfort and support throughout the day!
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Terrano

customer_reviews.title: The best ..
customer_reviews.text: These are the epitome of comfort...in any sport play work or labor intensive environment this is it I have many shoes that sold as comfort and support but these ..wow ! Just like house slippers...quality very good ..support plenty ....spring yes ..I am so glad I got these I was worried never bought shoes online ..thank God i did ..and thank you guys for making this amazing shoe available to Amazon buyers..also I have real back and leg issues so I'm really thinking this will help one last thing..buy them.. yes you too min half size larger
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Great support from the air soles
customer_reviews.text: My usual shoe size is 11 to 11.5. I initially ordered and 11.5, which turned out to be just a smidge tight in the toes. Amazon was great with setting up a no-cost return, and i had a size 12 shipped to me. Lengthwise, the shoes fit great, but width-wise, they are a little looser than what I've been used to; however, the comfort is excellent, and these are a great substitute for the Nikes I have usually bought.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Buy 1/2 size larger.
customer_reviews.text: I had really wanted these shoes. I was so disappointed that my big toes rub against the ends. I believe the size is correct, but that the elastic at the top pushes your feet forward. I have been knocking my heels back to try and loosen the elastic. This has helped.
customer_reviews.author: Diana L Barke

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are for real nothing like it
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very good I have joint problems do to arthritis I honestly don't feel pain when I wear them no pain which a major plus for me I wear them to work on a 12 hour days then a 30 min treadmill
customer_reviews.author: steelers1

customer_reviews.title: Great cushion but size up by 1/2
customer_reviews.text: I’m a little obsessed with the Hovr Phantom. Fantastic cushioning, very comfortable knit upper. I’d previously worn Hoka One One but had to give up on them when their lasts became too narrow. While the Hovr Phantom is not as plush as Hoka, it comes close. I now have 4 pairs😂. The only negative is that Under Armour can’t seem to get consistent sizing. I had to go up 1/2 size from my usual athletic shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: Rufus

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe: comfortable & stable
customer_reviews.text: They were a little difficult to put on because they're a little tight, but once they're on, they were very comfortable. I twisted the sole to see how stable they'd be and the passed; I shouldn't get plantar fasciitis from these shoes. The thick soles are comfortable for a 250+ pound man.
customer_reviews.author: Detroit Smooth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent running shoe
customer_reviews.text: It took about seven miles to break in fully, but these have been my go to running shoes. 3-5 mile runs, 3 or 4 times a week and they keep everything compressed and snug. One note, you basically can't wear anything but compression socks under these, as any bunching of fabric will become painful quickly.
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most comfortable shoes I ever have and are use this as an all-around gym shoe for cardio and weight training. It fit just as it should I order the size I normally wear and had no issues. Very light weight very breathable and very flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn B.

customer_reviews.title: great style and comfort
customer_reviews.text: really loved the look when I first saw them, after I bought and received them I am very happy with the fit and comfort very good support and cushion, others have sadi to buy a half size larger due to snug fit, the knit top is a snug fit but I felt they were good at my actual size.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce P.

customer_reviews.title: Off sizing
customer_reviews.text: Runs 1.5 to 2 sizes small. Ankle sock area very narrow and is felt more intensely with extended wear.
customer_reviews.author: Holli

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe, it is very comfortable and realses any stress on your feet which is very responsive and feels like there is a push between every step. They are amazing and are amazing running shoes no matter the distance. The only thing I would say when ordering, if you buy these, buy them half a size bigger, since they tend to run a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Small((
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, light, but very small in size! 9.5 size for 41 European small... The photo shows that these sneakers are much smaller than boots of the same size 9.5.Really cool sneakers, very upset
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gym shoes for my man and he can't stop talking about them..they are stylish and comfortable plus they come with wifi ..really wifi? Amazing
customer_reviews.author: aut

customer_reviews.title: FAKE SIZE CHART
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size 13US based on the size chart which should have been 31CM heel to toe. As I got the shoes I tried them on and it was too tight so I decided to measure it and I discovered that the size 13US is about 29CM and not as the size chart. I am very disappointed because I have lost a coupon, lost the price (bought them for 65USD) and lost time to ship it back.
customer_reviews.author: Yehonatan Arouch

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, great color great fit the only small issue I have high arches and they are a little tough to get on but once their on so much comfort.

customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits and feels great but the sole is horrible and very slippery on wet pavement which I run on quite often.

customer_reviews.text: Great shoe my favorite UA shoe!! Buying more for sure. Best part is how the shoe easily slips onto your ankle. You should know the cushion and comfort is outstanding due to the price tag on this shoe! Worth the money!

customer_reviews.text: This shoe is lights out!!!! I fell in love from the moment I put them on!!! I love the snug feeling around my ankles and the soft insoles are unbelievable this shoe is super comfortable I already ordered another pair!!!lol

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and durable. Runs small imo.

customer_reviews.title: Best all around shoe for the gym on market
customer_reviews.text: Quite possibly the best all around “gym” shoe I have ever owned. Great for lifting, training, and running

customer_reviews.title: The color is not the same as the advertised po
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are a great fit and the performance feel is awesome. I just wish they were the correct color. I chose the color in the picture above, which is in comparison to royal or cobalt blue. They are closer to aqua green

customer_reviews.title: Needs more inserts
customer_reviews.text: As for fitting great, I just feel in my opion it can use more cushion! To me it didn’t have enough cushion! As for the style different and I’m one likes different. So only thing I feel needs different would be more insert cushion

customer_reviews.title: fit
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable shoes once you get them on. however, because of the tight sock-like opening, it is extremely difficult to put the shoes on. it is a struggle every time. I would not recommend the shoe at all.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort!  Look good; feel great,  Tis nothing Under Armour I have ever purchased that I did not like.

Even though mine fit .5 smaller, they still feel comfortable on runs. It just sucks that I'm running 4-5 miles every other day with a busted toe nail.

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's HOVR Phantom Rn Running Shoe
product_meta.description: NEUTRAL: For runners who need flexibility, cushioning & versatility. UA HOVR technology provides 'zero gravity feel' to maintain energy return that helps eliminate impact step after step. Compression mesh Energy Web contains & molds UA HOVR foam to give back the energy you put in. Stretch-knit upper is comfortable, stable & provides a durable but sock-like fit & feel. 3D molded midfoot panel with laser perforations for increased ventilation & a secure fit. Updated ankle collar construction for added comfort & easier entry. External heel counter creates the ultimate in stable support. Full rubber outsole features unique knobbed texture for elevated traction & durability
feature_bullets: NEUTRAL: For runners who need flexibility, cushioning & versatility
UA HOVR technology provides 'zero gravity feel' to maintain energy return that helps eliminate impact step after step
Compression mesh Energy Web contains & molds UA HOVR foam to give back the energy you put in
Stretch-knit upper is comfortable, stable & provides a durable but sock-like fit & feel
3D molded midfoot panel with laser perforations for increased ventilation & a secure fit
